name: Amir Derakh
description: '''Amir Davidson''', professionally known as '''Amir Derakh''', is an American musician and record producer. He is the guitarist and the synthesizer player for the band [[Julien-K]], and was the guitarist for the band [[Dead by Sunrise]]. He was the [[Guitar synthesizer|g-synth]] player in the rock band [[Orgy (band)|Orgy]], and has also played guitar in the bands [[Rough Cutt]] and [[Jailhouse (band)|Jailhouse]].
